name: thermomagnetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
of or connected with the relationship between heat and the magnetic properties of a material: We performed magnetic analysis on rock samples at each site, including thermomagnetic measurements. This image shows the thermomagnetic behaviour of the materials as they are heated and cooled to different temperatures.
More examplesFewer examplesThe thermomagnetic properties of the compound were measured under a fixed magnetic field and under the application of different constant electrical fields.These results were confirmed by the thermomagnetic experiments.
